title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Strategic Hotels & Resorts, Inc.Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Strategic Hotels & Resorts, Inc.
Harwood Feffer LLP is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of Strategic Hotels & Resorts, Inc. concerning the proposed acquisition of the Company by Blackstone Real Estate Partners VIII .
Under the terms of the offer, the Blackstone would acquire Strategic Hotels in a transaction valued at approximately $6 billion. Pursuant to the deal, Strategic Hotels stockholders would receive $14.25 per share in cash. According to Yahoo Finance, at least one analyst has set a target price for Strategic Hotels stock of $17.00 per share, and the median analyst target price is $15.25 per share.
Our investigation concerns whether the Strategic Hotels board of directors is fulfilling its fiduciary duties, maximizing the value of the Company, disclosing all material benefits and costs, and obtaining full and fair consideration for Company stockholders.
Source:-Strategic Hotels
